p: Data were analyzed using the GraphPad Prism version 6.0b and 4.0. To test for normal distribution of data, D'Agostino and Pearson omnibus normality test was applied. Normally distributed data of multiple or two groups was analyzed using the one-way ANOVA, paired t-test, or unpaired t-test depending on the data sets that were compared. Regarding non-normally distributed data, the Mannâ€“Whitney test or Wilcoxon matched-pairs signed rank test was used.
